interactivity.requirements: Saturday or Sunday You must be on at least Day  130  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Everything Horrible "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first Saturday night on or after Day 130.

progression.synopsis: Ami , Ayane , and Maya are talking at bathhouse. Sensei is in the men's half, and can't really hear them. Ami doesn't like Ayane's talk of being in love with Sensei, and although Ayane promises to tone it down, her comments keep making Ami more and more suspicious. In the end, Ayane is willing to promise that she won't do anything with Sensei â€” but only if Ami admits that she likes Sensei "that way" too, which she refuses to do. Maya stays out of it.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
